sentence.Network_cn: 国家需要有一定的防御能力，以应对不可预知的情况。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (originally as ensurance in the sense 'ensuring, assurance, a guarantee'): from Old French enseurance, from enseurer (see ensure). Sense 1 dates from the mid 17th cent

entry.def: Insurance is an arrangement in which you pay money to a company, and they pay money to you if something unpleasant happens to you, for example if your property is stolen or damaged, or if you get a serious illness.

example.ex: The insurance company paid out for the stolen jewellery and silver...
example.tran: 保险公司赔付了遭窃的珠宝和银器。

example.ex: We recommend that you take out travel insurance on all holidays.
example.tran: 我们建议您为所有假期都购买旅行保险。

entry.def: If you do something as insurance against something unpleasant happening, you do it to protect yourself in case the unpleasant thing happens.

example.ex: The country needs a defence capability as insurance against the unexpected.
example.tran: 国家需要有一定的防御能力，以应对不可预知的情况。

means.word_mean: 1. promise of reimbursement in the case of loss; paid to people or companies so concerned about hazards that they have made prepayments to an insurance company
2. written contract or certificate of insurance;

stems_affixes.word_buile: assure[v.肯定;确保]+ed……的→adj.确实的, 确定的
sure肯定,确定→adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确
assured[adj.确实的, 确定的]+ly表副词→adv.确实地;确信地
sure肯定,确定→adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确
insure[v.保险,给…保险;保证]+ance表名词→n.保险,保险费,保险业

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证,担保;确信,断言;信心,信念
stems_affixes.word_buile: assure[v.肯定;确保]+ance表名词→n.保证,担保;确信,断言;信心,信念

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证人, 担保, 保证
stems_affixes.word_buile: sure肯定,确定+ty表名词→n.保证人, 担保, 保证
as一再+sure确定→一再确定→肯定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证, 担保, 使安全, 保证得到
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……+sure[adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确]→v.保证, 担保, 使安全, 保证得到 v.确保, 确保, 保证
in使……+sure肯定,确定→v.保险,给…保险;保证
re再次+assure确信→v.消除某人疑虑
